tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Don't have words to thank Dr Archit for his patience in first understanding my complicated dental issues and then explaining the possible treatments. Step by step, he explained everything so nicely that I now feel as educated about my problem as the doctor himself. I am sure this is the beginning of a very strong healthy relationship with him in times to come.
reply_text: We are truly humbled by your kind words and look forward to serving you to the best of our abilities.
